2. Installation¶

Table of Contents

  • 2.1. FreeRTOS+Windows
  • 2.2. Other Platforms
    • 2.2.1. Cross Platform Freedom for Single- and Multi-Core Support
    • 2.2.2. Database Support for a Variety of Processors and Boards

The ITTIA DB IoT™ software development kit contains software libraries and utilities for C, C++, and other programming languages. To install, developers need a a desktop machine, a host system running Windows, and a target device for developing and distributing applications with ITTIA DB IoT.

ITTIA DB IoT has been ported to several different operating systems and hardware architectures and each operating system and architecture has it’s own configuration. Customers can contact ITTIA and request a port to desired hardware and operating systems. The following are important criteria to make DB IoT available on your platform. With the requirements met, you can store as much data as your storage media permits.

You can find the version number for ITTIA DB IoT within the db_version.h header file of your working project directory.

Memory requirements for ITTIA DB IoT database include 150kB ROM and 50kB RAM.
